field.name: delay
field.label: Delay
field.description: The time one slide stays on the screen in Milliseconds

field.name: touchenabled
field.label: Touch Enabled
field.description: Enable Swipe Function on touch devices

field.name: stop_on_hover
field.label: Stop On Hover
field.description: Stop the Timer when hovering the slider

field.name: shuffle
field.label: Shuffle Mode
field.description: Turn Shuffle Mode on and off! Will be randomized only once at the start.

field.name: load_googlefont
field.label: Load Google Font
field.description: yes / no to load google font

field.name: google_font
field.label: Google Font
field.description: The google font family to load

field.name: stop_slider
field.label: Stop Slider
field.description: On / Off to stop slider after some amount of loops / slides

field.name: stop_after_loops
field.label: Stop After Loops
field.description: Stop the slider after certain amount of loops. 0 related to the first loop.

field.name: stop_at_slide
field.label: Stop At Slide
field.description: Stop the slider at the given slide

field.name: position
field.label: Position on the page
field.description: The position of the slider on the page, (float:left, float:right, margin:0px auto;)

field.name: margin_top
field.label: Margin Top
field.description: The top margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_bottom
field.label: Margin Bottom
field.description: The bottom margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_left
field.label: Margin Left
field.description: The left margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_right
field.label: Margin Right
field.description: The right margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: show_timerbar
field.label: Show Timer Line
field.description: Show the top running timer line

field.name: timebar_position
field.label: Timer Line Position
field.description: Set the timer line position to top or bottom

field.name: background_color
field.label: Background color
field.description: Slider wrapper div background color, for transparent slider, leave empty.

field.name: padding
field.label: Padding (border)
field.description: The wrapper div padding, if it has value, then together with background color it it will make border around the slider.

field.name: show_background_image
field.label: Show Background Image
field.description: yes / no to put background image to the main slider wrapper.

field.name: background_image
field.label: Background Image Url
field.description: The background image that will be on the slider wrapper. Will be shown at slider preloading.

field.name: navigaion_type
field.label: Navigation Type
field.description: Display type of the navigation bar (Default:none

field.name: navigation_arrows
field.label: Navigation Arrows
field.description: Display position of the Navigation Arrows (** By navigation Type Thumb arrows always centered or none visible)

field.name: nav_offset_hor
field.label: Nav. Offset Horizontal
field.description: The Bar is centered but could be moved this pixel count left(e.g. -10) or right (Default: 0) ** By resizing the banner, it will be always centered !!

field.name: nav_offset_vert
field.label: Nav. Offset Vertical
field.description: The Bar is bound to the bottom but could be moved this pixel count up (e. g. -20) or down (Default: 20)

field.name: navigaion_always_on
field.label: Always Show Navigation
field.description: Always show the navigation and the thumbnails.

field.name: hide_thumbs
field.label: Hide Navitagion After
field.description: Time after that the Navigation and the Thumbs will be hidden(Default: 200 ms)
